definition: having a beak resembling that of a duck, small densely furred aquatic monotreme of Australia and Tasmania having a broad bill and tail and webbed feet
details:
adjective
- having a beak resembling that of a duck
= synonyms: duck-billed
noun
- small densely furred aquatic monotreme of Australia and Tasmania having a broad bill and tail and webbed feet
= synonyms: platypus
- primitive fish of the Mississippi valley having a long paddle-shaped snout
= synonyms: paddlefish
